name: Infinity Furnace
description:
Unleash the ultimate smelting power with the Infinite Furnace Mod for Minecraft! This mod introduces the Infinite Furnace, a unique furnace crafted from the Netherrack.
Features:
Infinite Smelting: No need to worry about fuel anymore. Infinite Furnace smelts items endlessly without consuming any fuel.
Balanced Smelting Speed: To maintain game balance, Infinite Furnace smelts items at a slower rate compared to regular furnaces.
Upgrade your smelting game and make your Minecraft adventures more efficient with the Infinite Infinite Furnace!
